title: UFYB 99: Fear and Safety
itunes:title: Fear and Safety
description:
Join me this week as I break down the way we process the feelings of safety and danger. These feelings are no exception to thought work, and it’s something we need to work on to teach our lizard brains that our perception of our safety is our responsibility and can be managed.

Get full show notes and more information here: http://unfuckyourbrain.com/99
content:encoded:
Join me this week as I break down the way we process the feelings of safety and danger. These feelings are no exception to thought work, and it’s something we need to work on to teach our lizard brains that our perception of our safety is our responsibility and can be managed.

Get full show notes and more information here: http://unfuckyourbrain.com/99
itunes:subtitle: What physical safety and emotional safety mean as a feeling.
itunes:author: Kara Loewentheil
